thread.title: ‘Authentic Cuba’ campaign promotes Cuban tourist destinations in MexicoTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: ‘Authentic Cuba’ campaign promotes Cuban tourist destinations in MexicoTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: ‘Authentic Cuba’ campaign promotes Cuban tourist destinations in MexicoTravelandtourworld.com
text:
‘Authentic Cuba’ campaign promotes Cuban tourist destinations in Mexico
In the presence of tour operators, travel agencies, airlines and local authorities, ‘Authentic Cuba’ campaign was presented in Mexico. Authentic Cuba is a campaign to promote tourist destinations in the Caribbean Island.
Xiomara Martinez, Director of the Office of Tourism of Cuba here, said the Island’s attractions go beyond sun and beaches because the Cuban and Mexican peoples are united by history, traditions and culture. She promoted the legendary cities of Cuba: Baracoa, Bayamo, Trinidad, Sancti Spiritus, Camaguey, Remedios and Santiago de Cuba, who already celebrated the 500th anniversary of their foundation.
In the next few days Authentic Cuba will be in the states of Monterrey, Cohauila, Jalisco and Guanajuato.
Interjet airline announced new flights between the two nations during the presentation. The new flights will commence on October 15 between the routes Mexico-Varadero and Monterrey-Havana. The Mexico-Varadero route will operate four flights a week (Thursday and Sunday).
The MSC firm, also attending the event, has plans to put in operation a multidestination cruiser from Havana this year.
